Run4YourBits

Class LowObstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Run4YourBits.Obstacle
      • Run4YourBits.LowObstacle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class LowObstacle
extends Obstacle
    Usually with around the same height as the character these obstacles must be avoided by jumping so you won't crash with them and lose a life by doing so.

        Checks whether the obstacle has collided with the avatar and takes action

        checkCollisions in class Obstacle
        Parameters:
        character - the character which the obstacle collides with
        sounds - Thread used to save thread creation
        hitSound - filename of the hitting sound for that level

        soundPlayer - Thread for playing the sounds
